author: Ivan Stanchev
comment: Hey there! Thank you for creating this app. I have nothing to say, that isn't mentioned in previous comments, and actually I think that most of the things said are already fixed, as I cannot see them. The only thing, and it's really a small one, that buggers me a bit, is Ezra on the Sheathipede. He is with pilot skill 5, but the app displays it as PS 3. Other than that, everything is absolutely awesome. Keep up the good work! Cheers!

reply.author: Shinayser
reply.content: Hey Ivan, this Ezra issue has been fixed. But you need to remove him from your squad and add it back. Sorry for that :(... Best regards man!

author: Richard Ellis
comment: Good little app, too many & big adds and I'm not spending £7 to remove them. Try a 99p level.  Edit to Response: Apologies did not meant to upset, your app is very good and I usually buy apps to remove adverts as they drain battery etc but the price is a little steep. Totally your prerogative to price how you see but this will limit your customer base as what kid/young adult has that kind of money to use when a pen and paper or other free app will suffice. Keep up the good work and you effort is appreciated, I only wish there was a more realistic minimum, see other apps mate not many are that steep... Rating increased to show support :-)

reply.author: Shinayser
reply.content: Hey Richard thanks a lot for your opinion. Its a pity to know that my 300 hours of work on this app does not worth your £7. Hope you give it another try in the future. Best regards!

author: Justin Sproles
comment: Would like to see a reference card tab please and thank you.  This is the best squad builder app for x wing. All the other ones don't come close. Would have actually paid a dollar or two for it. Would like to see the rest of the pilot cards for the tie silencer, and rest of the other new waves. Also an iPhone compatible... Definitely charge the iPhone users lol

author: D S
comment: I'm not sure if I like this app being collection-based because I like to build squads of ships I don't have, but I still think the interface is awesome.

author: A D
comment: Great App to track what units I have. Can also add cards to my collection that I was able to obtain from trades, ect.

author: Graeme Corrin
comment: Hands down, the best X-Wing Squad Builder on Android.  Cannot recommend highly enough.

author: Ryan Stout
comment: Best squadron builder Igor android. My nephews would love this on IOS

author: Magma Snott
comment: Best list builder hands down :)

author: Steve King
comment: Best squad builder available for X-Wing. A dark mode would be nice. Desperately needs an easier way to add upgrade cards and a way to see what cards you need. Cluster mine description missing detonation information. Search bar on home screen to quickly look up cards/pilots. Donate and help the developer build this app into its full potential

author: JAME5 MORIARTY
comment: This is my favorite Squadron builder. However I have a minor quibble, in one of the last updates, it changed the order of upgrade cards from alphabetical to point cost, personally I perfer it the former. I would love it the creators, made a way to customize the app, or change some of the settings. Overall a great app!

author: izzachrie ichwan
comment: Great companion app.... quick update , complete sets.. nice app. And is suggested you made the star wars armada app too...

author: Shawn Shawn
comment: Is there a way to get a cloning ability, so we don't have to keep going back to a selection menu for no named pilots with the same upgrades?

author: Vincent Godin-Filion
comment: Perfect X-Wing Miniature list builder! I keep all my builds in the app, and use it as reference during games.

author: Xian Yong Lim
comment: PLEASE FIX dial for resistance bomber.

author: Jonathan Mcrae
comment: Fantastic app.

author: Keith Spragg
comment: Great app and has a lot of really useful features. Because this app was kept up to date so well by the dev, I forked over my £7 to back the project! 👍 Codex is a great addition to the app, and now I'm one step closer to having just one X wing app for all!

author: Jeremy Thorne
comment: So many adds. Also it doesn't track all the collection thus far. Example I have the entire collection to date but I'm not allowed to add the Black One title to no T-70 not even to Poe. Even though I do have the HotR.  If there was a way the disable adds or something it would be better then the other xwing apps there is.

reply.author: Shinayser
reply.content: Jeremy, the adds are removed for all project backers. Also, the collection is working fine. If you want you can mail me the details só I can help you with that. Anyway, thankyou for your 2 Star review.

author: Patrick Barry
comment: Great app to build lists and check cards

author: Jerrod Ward
comment: Very happy with help this app provides!

author: Matthew Tryon
comment: Awesome.  Keep it up

author: Lance Earl
comment: Good app. Unfortunately it doesn't do anything when it tries to log in to my Google Drive. I press the login button to sync to my drove and after a few seconds it says it's unable to log in.

author: James Baker
comment: Best organiser I've found! The streamlined collections UX is ideal when building the squad. You can find where to get those missing cards (you may be able to avoid the extortion of singles)!

reply.author: Shinayser
reply.content: James this is a rule of the game.

author: Chase Brady
comment: Almost perfect! But the big hold up for me is collection management. I have over 30 ships and have bought and traded upgrade cards, ships, etc. I can't remove the upgrade cards I've traded away and my collection is too large for me to remember if I have certain cards or not when I go to make a list. Help me, Startactics! You're my only hope! It would also be AMAZING if I could go into the collection and look at upgrade cards by type (for example here's the list of all Astromechs available in the game and you can add or subtract how many you have easily to alter your collection)

author: Mark Randell
comment: The best app out there just got even  better! You can now search individual cards via a search box instead of trying to remember what set an upgrade or pilpt card came from! Thanks for listening Daniel! 5* from me and I'll spread the word!

author: Shannon Perumall
comment: Best squadron builder app available. One of my only areas of improvement got solved with the new Codex feature!  Would be great if it the ability to copy paste a ship+upgrades in a list, but other than that it's brilliant!

author: Justin Geering
comment: Solid. Simple. Constantly updated and improved. Hoping for ability to clone ship builds within a list as well as switch pilots on the same ship without deleting it.

author: Joanne True
comment: Good app, lacking the ability to copy a pilot build multiple times within a list rather than having to enter each identical  pilot individually.

author: scott Yadon
comment: Great app. Does need  an update to be complete.  Just missing a pilot or two and some cards. The only squad builder I use now.

author: Alan Ellis
comment: Excellent app! Just wish i could filter by faction on collection screen.

author: John LoMascolo
comment: So I love this app, the only thing that is missing for me is a way to view your saved squadrons in image format rather than just the written list. Unless there is already a way to do that and I'm just not seeing it.. Otherwise, very clean UI, easy to use, I can't say enough good things. Great job!

reply.author: Shinayser
reply.content: John share your squadron as a "PlayPaper", it is what you want. Best regards!

author: David Ware
comment: This is by far the best X-wing app out there. A few of my friends  that also play run different apps on their devices which don't even compare.

author: Jack Knight
comment: The best squad builder by far, couldn't fault it if I wanted to.

author: Ewan Wood
comment: Good updates but please add Guns for Hire!

author: Westley Gomez
comment: An excellent squad builder, taking into account what i have rather than giving all the options you could have. There is an option to remove that but i perfer to know my limits and what i need to get.

author: xD4rkD4nt3x
comment: What i need, when i need it! Clean and complete!

author: John Barilani
comment: Great app! Just updated on Dec 15!!

author: Nadia Orlic
comment: Find options for saving Collection and Squads - poor. I rather prefer to have them on my Tab so I can store them or copy on my terms. Not some cloud bs.

reply.author: Shinayser
reply.content: Nadia , you can share your squads as HASH and store them the way you most like. Best regards!

author: Steve Gundill
comment: Become the go to app with the apparent death of squadron builder. Would love to give this a higher rating, it's very good, but upgrades not being in points order is very annoying. If that was fixed it would really get a higher rating. It's much better when you have a few points to spare to be able to see everything that cost that amount together rather than the annoying alphabetical list that leaves you having to scroll back and forth.   Would hit t stars if it didn't cost so much to remove ads. £7 four cheapest option is a hell of alot for such a simple app.

reply.author: Shinayser
reply.content:
Hey Steve thanks for your review. That point cost suggestion is a cool one, I will consider that on future release.
About the backing value I will disagree with you: that is not a simple app as it looks. There is a lot of card logic inplementation to make safe for players to squadron building without messing things up.

author: Nicholas Hartzell
comment: I like the app, but I'm experiencing a bug? I can only add. One B/SF Bomber into a list right now.

reply.author: Shinayser
reply.content: Nicholas, can you send me more details by email?

author: JP Casorso
comment: Great app. The wording for "Expert handling" is incorrect. The wording that says that it's a free action but the card does not specify that.
